title: Geek Sweets (gnv64)
description: Geek Sweets: An Adventurer's Guide to the World of Baking Wizardry by Jenny Burgesse and Jen Yates Mango | December 2017 | ISBN-10: 1633536165 | PDF | 263 Pages | 16.6 mb Geek Sweets: The ultimate guide to creating 60 confections for the legions of geek fans out there ? from Star Wars to Game of Thrones to Harry Potter and much more! Easy baking recipes: Geek Sweets is organized so even a beginning baker can have success. It's a baking cookbook full of beautiful photographs, with easy baking recipes for the 'truly geeky'. Geek Sweets is filled with cupcakes recipes, easy cookie recipes, and that special cake pops recipe. Theme party ideas: Geek Sweets delivers step-by-step how-to's for every adventurer??from the squire just starting a journey, to a well-worn dragon slayer looking for a challenge. Geek Sweets also includes theme party ideas with cocktail recipes and a companion website with printables to enhance all of your geeky gatherings, including your Game of Thrones viewing parties, as well as theme party ideas with fantasy-adventure themes. About the author https://s18.postimg.org/cxqknifo9/Jenny_Burgesse.jpg A graphic designer by day, Sweet Geek Jenny Burgesse found another passion buried beneath a pile of flour and dutch process cocoa powder. Geek Sweets began in Ottawa as a home-based bakery, with everything made from scratch, just like grandma used to make - If grandma made Cthulhu Cookies and Battlestar Galacticakes. After finding success on the great plains of The Internet, Jenny and her trusty sidekick Mr. B relocated to Vancouver to be close to family. CONTENT?? Foreword by Jen Yates of Cake Wrecks 9 Dungeon Master's Preface: Using this Book 11 Adventurer's Inventory 15 Skills Training and Combat Tricks 27 Essential Baking Spells 41 Level 1: Squire 77 Side Quest: Game Night 111 Level 2: Knight 119 Side Quest: Partyin' in the Galaxy 161 Level 3: Dragon Slayer 167 Side Quest: Winter is Here - A Party of Thrones 209 Festival Reveller 217 Side Quest: The Rocking Dead - Zombie Apocalypse Finale Party 251 Resources 259 About the Author 261 https://s18.postimg.org/c87sb5uk9/Geek_Sweets.jpg
